sentences.english: They cut up rough , sometimes to person brutal, want to be constant very inhospitality with heartless.
sentences.chinese: 他们愤怒，有时对人凶暴，要不变得很冷漠和无情。

sentences.english: Men are cruel but Mper is kind.
sentences.chinese: 独夫们是凶暴的，但百姓是善良的。

sentences.english: There is a monstrous demon called Sticky-Hair living there.
sentences.chinese: 有一个凶暴的叫粘发鬼的大怪物住在里面。

sentences.english: "Farmers could definitely get violent if their year's work is destroyed, " said Atta .
sentences.chinese: 一旦辛苦一年的成果被破坏，农人必定会变得凶暴。

sentences.english: Black widows are solitary year-round except during this violent mating ritual.
sentences.chinese: 黑寡妇除了这一凶暴的交配过程以外终年独居。

sentences.english: Children were rent from their mothers'arms by the brutal soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 凶暴的士兵强使孩子离开母亲的怀抱。

sentences.english: Children were rent from their mothers' arms by the brutal soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 凶暴的士兵强使孩子们离开他们母亲的怀抱。

sentences.english: In the ferocious assault that followed, young Skywalker nearly killed Vader.
sentences.chinese: 在凶暴攻击中，年轻的天行者差点杀死维德。

sentences.english: Her husband 's violent and abusive behavior drove her to the verge of despair.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫的凶暴，辱骂行为将他逼到了几乎绝望的境地。

sentences.english: Men are cruel- but Man is kind.
sentences.chinese: 独夫们是凶暴的，但黎民是善良的。

sentences.english: Benerro's rantings will only serve to bring a savage wrath down upon his head.
sentences.chinese: 班奈罗的的宣讲智慧带给他的脑袋一记凶暴的愤怒。

sentences.english: Music hath charms to soothe the savage beast.
sentences.chinese: 音乐有抚凶暴心灵的魅力。

sentences.english: Music has the charm to soothe a savage breast, but not the unmusical one.
sentences.chinese: 音乐能平息野蛮凶暴，对不通音律者却无能为力。

definition: variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
